snippet: Metropolitan Entertainment has accused CMJ of failing to repay loans Metropolitan made in 2009 and 2010 to help keep the festival afloat.
abstract: Metropolitan Entertainment accuses CMJ of failing to repay nearly $800,000 in loans Metropolitan made in 2009 and 2010 to help keep the CMJ Music Marathon festival afloat; case has origins in failed merger.
lead_paragraph: Metropolitan Entertainment has accused CMJ of failing to repay loans Metropolitan made in 2009 and 2010 to help keep the festival afloat.

headline.main: Group Behind Music Festival Is Sued Over Failed Merger
headline.print_headline: Group Behind Music Festival Is Sued Over Failed Merger
